name: product-tracker
description: Product Tracker | DApp for Supply Chains

scripts.dev: echo "Installation or Audit based on availibily of Dependencies of the DApp... " && npm install && echo "Loading Contracts onto the blockchain based on details truffle-config.js..." && truffle migrate --reset && echo "Launching the Web DApp in your browser, read the README.md to configure Metamask wallet" && lite-server

author: Vidhu Arnav Singh
